test.name: Validate Home Page

kw.name: Given I Open '${site_url}' in '${browser}' Browser
kw.doc: This keyword opens given url in the browser of the choice.

kw.name: Set Executable Path For Different Platforms
kw.doc: This keyword sets the driver executable according to the platform i.e. Windows/MacOS

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Set Web Driver Executable Path For Windows
Set Web Driver Executable Path For MacOS
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Set Web Driver Executable Path For MacOS
kw.doc: This keyword sets the path for driver executable

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.arg: msg=Unable to set the path for webdriver executable.
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.arg: msg=Unable to set the path for webdriver executable.
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.
kw.msg: {"acceptDownloads": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "httpCredentials": "XXX", "hideRfBrowser": false}

{'acceptDownloads': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'bypassCSP': False, 'deviceScaleFactor': 1, 'isMobile': False, 'hasTouch': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'httpCredentials': 'XXX', 'hideRfBrowser': False}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://qa-task.backbasecloud.com

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then Validate Title In Home Page
kw.doc: This keyword validates tile of the home page

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: And Validate Tags are present
kw.doc: This keyword validates that the tags are present in the homepage

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the count of elements found with ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: And List Of Articles Is Present
kw.doc: This keyword checks that global feed articles are present.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.arg: message=Articles aren't present in Global Feed
kw.doc: Returns the count of elements found with ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: And Validate Pagination On Home Page
kw.doc: This keyword checks for the list of pagination of articles

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.arg: message=Feed Article Pagination is not Present.
kw.doc: Returns the count of elements found with ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: This test case login using basic authentication and validates Home Page
